name: Pumpkin patch (burdy96)
description:
Game made for the Cozy Autumn Jam (2022) . 

The aim of the game is to pick as many pumpkins as you can before all the plots of land are filled with pumpkins. The bigger the pumpkin, the more points its worth!

You can just play to pick some pumpkins just for fun and to chill out, or try and beat your top score, the choice is yours!
